entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 March 2023
